item.title: 台湾在台积电商业机密案中起诉东京电子部门
item.description: 台湾检方周二表示，在一名前员工因窃取芯片制造商台积电的商业机密而被起诉后，他们已指控东京电子台湾分公司违反了《国家安全法》和《商业机密法》。【原文：Taiwan prosecutors said on Tuesday they had charged Tokyo Electron's Taiwan unit with violating the National Security Act and the Trade Secrets Act after a former employee was indicted for stealing trade secrets from chipmaker TSMC .】

item.title: 普拉达经过漫长的求爱过程后完成了对范思哲的收购
item.description: 普拉达（Prada）周二表示，它已经完成了对较小的意大利竞争对手范思哲（Versace）的收购。【原文：Prada said on Tuesday it had completed the acquisition of smaller Italian rival Versace, a brand the luxury group said it had long coveted.】

item.title: 经合组织称，关税、人工智能热潮可能考验全球经济增长的韧性
item.description: 经济合作与发展组织（OECD）表示，由于人工智能投资热潮有助于抵消美国提高关税带来的部分冲击，全球经济增长势头好于预期，并上调了对一些主要经济体的展望。【原文：Global growth is holding up better than expected as an artificial intelligence investment boom helps offset some of the shock from U.S. tariff hikes, the OECD said, nudging up its outlook for some major economies.】

item.title: 路易威登掌门人皮特罗-贝卡里（Pietro Beccari）将出任路威酩轩集团时装部门首席执行官
item.description: 法国奢侈品巨头路易威登集团周二表示，路易威登首席执行官皮特罗-贝卡里（Pietro Beccari）已被任命为路威酩轩集团时装部门的首席执行官。【原文：Louis Vuitton CEO Pietro Beccari has been appointed as the chief executive of LVMH's fashion division, the French luxury giant said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 欧盟法院裁定荷兰法院可受理针对苹果应用程序商店的反垄断案件
item.description: 欧盟法院周二裁定，荷兰法庭对两家当地基金会起诉苹果公司应用程序商店涉嫌反竞争行为一案拥有管辖权。【原文：The Court of Justice of the European Union on Tuesday ruled the Dutch tribunals have jurisdiction over a case brought against Apple's App Store by two local foundations over alleged anticompetitive conduct.】

item.title: 解说员：什么是印度具有政治争议的 Sanchar Saathi 网络安全应用程序？
item.description: 印度要求智能手机制造商在所有新设备上预装一个国有网络安全应用程序的规定引发了一场政治风暴，加剧了人们对世界上人口最多的国家政府进行窥探的担忧。【原文：India's mandate requiring smartphone makers to preload a state-owned cyber safety app on all new devices has triggered a political firestorm, fanning fears of government snooping in the world's most populous nation.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，旅游预订平台 Klook 将推迟至 2026 年初在美国上市
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道，在线旅游平台 Klook 计划明年初在美国上市。【原文：Online travel platform Klook plans to list in the US early next year, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 独家报道：埃克森正在与伊拉克商谈收购卢克石油公司在西古尔奈 2 号巨型油田的股份
item.description: 五位直接了解此事的伊拉克官方消息人士告诉路透社，埃克森美孚已与伊拉克石油部接洽，表示有意购买俄罗斯卢克石油公司在巨型西古尔奈 2 号油田的多数股份。【原文：Exxon Mobil has approached the Iraqi oil ministry to express its interest in buying Russian firm Lukoil's majority stake in the giant West Qurna 2 oilfield, five Iraqi official sources with direct knowledge of the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 独家报道：埃克森美孚就收购卢克石油西古尔奈油田股份一事与伊拉克接触
item.description: 五位直接了解此事的伊拉克官方消息人士告诉路透社，埃克森美孚已与伊拉克石油部接洽，表示有意购买俄罗斯卢克石油公司在巨型西古尔奈 2 号油田的多数股份。【原文：Exxon Mobil has approached the Iraqi oil ministry to express its interest in buying Russian firm Lukoil's majority stake in the giant West Qurna 2 oilfield, five Iraqi official sources with direct knowledge of the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 美国投资者 Saba 阻止 Baillie Gifford 和爱丁堡合并
item.description: 英国 Baillie Gifford 美国增长信托公司周二表示，该公司与同行爱丁堡全球投资信托公司的合并计划已被其第一大股东、美国激进投资者萨巴资本管理公司（Saba Capital Management）阻止。【原文：Britain's Baillie Gifford US Growth Trust said on Tuesday that the company's proposed merger with peer Edinburgh Worldwide Investment Trust has been blocked by U.S. activist investor Saba Capital Management, its top shareholder.】

item.title: 由于担心人工智能导致失业，英国一些年轻工人转向技术行业
item.description: 在劳动力市场上，人工智能正在迅速改变工作，有时甚至会取代工作，学生玛丽娜-亚罗申科（Maryna Yaroshenko）希望找到一份面向未来、长期稳定的职业。【原文：In a labour market where artificial intelligence is quickly transforming and sometimes replacing jobs, student Maryna Yaroshenko wanted to find a future-proof career that offered long-term stability.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称中国发放首批精简稀土出口许可证
item.description: 周二，一位熟悉内情的消息人士称，至少有三家中国稀土磁铁制造商获得了加速向某些客户出口稀土的许可证，从而实现了唐纳德-特朗普总统和习近平主席峰会的一项重要成果。【原文：At least three Chinese rare earth magnet makers have secured licenses enabling them to accelerate exports to some customers, a source familiar with the matter said on Tuesday, fulfilling a key outcome of the summit between Presidents Donald Trump and Xi Jinping.】

item.title: 独家报道随着政治呼声日益高涨，苹果将抵制印度预装国营应用程序的命令
item.description: 三位熟知内情的消息人士称，苹果公司不打算遵守在其智能手机中预装国有网络安全应用程序的规定，并将向新德里转达其担忧，因为政府此举引发了对监控的担忧。【原文：Apple does not plan to comply with a mandate to preload its smartphones with a state-owned cyber safety app and will convey its concerns to New Delhi, three sources familiar with the matter said, after the government's move sparked surveillance concerns.】

item.title: 早间竞价拍卖出价稳定日本债券跌势
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 第二位代理顾问呼吁投票反对西太平洋银行董事在澳大利亚证券交易所的任职
item.description: 第二家有影响力的代理顾问建议机构投资者投票反对西太平洋银行（Westpac）非执行董事彼得-纳什（Peter Nash）连任，理由是他曾在陷入困境的澳大利亚证券交易所（ASX）董事会任职六年。【原文：A second influential proxy adviser has recommended institutional investors vote against re-electing Westpac non-executive director Peter Nash, citing his six-year stint on the board of the troubled Australian Securities Exchange (ASX).】

item.title: 欧盟在让储蓄者放弃现金的艰苦斗争中迈出一小步
item.description: 在开始建立资本市场联盟十年之后，欧盟仍在努力达成一个框架，鼓励储蓄者将现金用于集团内部而不是美国，这促使其 27 个成员国中的一些国家开始单干。【原文：A decade after it began working on a capital markets union, the EU is still struggling to agree a framework that encourages savers to put their cash to work within the bloc rather than in the U.S., prompting some of its 27 members to go it alone.】

item.title: 信息日报》称，Marvell 正在就以数十亿美元收购 Celestial AI 进行深入谈判
item.description: The Information 周一援引知情人士的话报道，美国芯片制造商 Marvell Technology 正在就收购芯片初创公司 Celestial AI 进行深入谈判，该交易将以现金加股票的方式进行，价值数十亿美元。【原文：U.S. chipmaker Marvell Technology is in advanced talks to acquire chip startup Celestial AI in a cash-and-stock deal worth multiple billions of dollars, the Information reported on Monday, citing people with knowledge of the deal.】

item.title: 据《The Information》报道，OpenAI 计划改进 ChatGPT，并推迟广告等举措。
item.description: 据 The Information 周一援引一份内部备忘录报道，OpenAI 首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）告诉员工，他正宣布 "红色代码 "以改进 ChatGPT，并计划推迟广告等其他计划。【原文：OpenAI CEO Sam Altman told employees he was declaring a "code red" to improve ChatGPT and is planning to delay other initiatives, such as advertising, The Information reported on Monday, citing an internal memo.】

item.title: 债券和比特币大跌导致股市不稳
item.description: 周二，在加密货币下滑和日本即将加息引发的全球债券大跌之后，股市涨势平淡，交易员也变得谨慎起来。【原文：Stocks made muted gains and traders were wary on Tuesday, following a slide in cryptocurrencies and a global bond selloff triggered by a looming interest rate hike in Japan.】

item.title: 供应面临地缘政治风险，石油价格上涨
item.description: 周二早盘，油价连续第二个交易日攀升，原因是市场参与者评估了乌克兰无人机袭击俄罗斯能源基地和美国-委内瑞拉紧张局势加剧所带来的风险。【原文：Oil prices climbed in early trade on Tuesday for a second consecutive session as market participants assessed risks stemming from Ukrainian drone strikes on Russian energy sites and mounting U.S.-Venezuela tensions.】

item.title: Coupang 数据泄露事件发生后，韩国总统李明博呼吁加大处罚力度
item.description: 韩国总统李在明周二表示，电子商务平台 Coupang 的大规模客户数据泄露事件为加强数字隐私保护敲响了警钟，并下令计划提高对此类失误的罚款和处罚。【原文：South Korean President Lee Jae Myung said on Tuesday the massive customer data leak from e-commerce platform Coupang is a wake-up call for stronger protection of digital privacy and ordered plans to raise fines and penalties for such lapses.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，特朗普政府将为 XLight 注资最多 1.5 亿美元
item.description: 华尔街日报》周一援引美国商务部的消息报道，特朗普政府已同意入股英特尔前首席执行官帕特-盖尔辛格（Pat Gelsinger）的 XLight 初创公司。【原文：The Trump administration has agreed to take an equity stake in former Intel CEO Pat Gelsinger's XLight startup, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday, citing the U.S. Commerce Department.】

item.title: 三星推出首款可折叠手机，竞争将白热化
item.description: 三星电子（Samsung Electronics）周二发布了其首款可多次折叠的智能手机，以巩固其在手机市场上的地位，而这一市场的竞争预计将愈演愈烈。【原文：Samsung Electronics unveiled on Tuesday its first multi-folding smartphone, in a bid to strengthen its position in a sector of the phone market where competition is expected to intensify.】

item.title: 澳大利亚青少年挑战社交媒体禁令，称互联网安全将大打折扣
item.description: 一名青少年起诉澳大利亚政府，要求推翻一项针对 16 岁以下青少年的社交媒体禁令，他说，这项措施将使互联网对青少年更加危险，而且会被广泛规避。【原文：A teenager suing the Australian government to overturn a ban on social media for under-16s says the measure would make the internet more dangerous for young people and be widely circumvented.】

item.title: 总理表示英特尔将在马来西亚追加投资 2.08 亿美元
item.description: 马来西亚总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣（Anwar Ibrahim）表示，美国芯片制造商英特尔已宣布在该国追加投资 8.6 亿林吉特（2.08 亿美元），用于组装和测试业务。【原文：Malaysian Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim said U.S. chipmaker Intel has announced an additional investment of 860 million ringgit ($208 million) in the country for assembly and testing operations.】

item.title: 澳大利亚推出人工智能路线图，放弃更严格的规则
item.description: 澳大利亚周二公布了一份在其经济中加快采用人工智能的路线图，但表示将依靠现有法律来管理新出现的风险，从而放弃了早些时候针对高风险情景制定更严格规则的计划。【原文：Australia on Tuesday unveiled a roadmap to ramp up the adoption of artificial intelligence across its economy but said it would rely on existing laws to manage emerging risks, stepping back from earlier plans for tougher rules on high-risk scenarios.】

item.title: PMI数据支持降息，美元处于守势
item.description: 周二，美元继续承压，因为全球最大经济体制造业活动数据弱于预期，这给美联储在本月晚些时候的政策会议上降息带来了压力。【原文：The U.S. dollar remained under pressure on Tuesday as weaker-than-expected manufacturing activity data from the world's biggest economy heaped pressure on the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates at its policy meeting later this month.】

item.title: Adobe 分析公司称，美国 "网络星期一 "在线销售额达 91 亿美元
item.description: Adobe Analytics 公司称，美国购物者在 "网络星期一 "的网上消费额达 91 亿美元，为 "黑色星期五 "周末的强劲表现画上了句号。【原文：U.S. shoppers spent $9.1 billion online on Cyber Monday, Adobe Analytics said, capping a strong Black Friday weekend marked by splurges from wealthier consumers and deal-hunting by lower-income households.】

item.title: 苹果任命 Amar Subramanya 为新的人工智能副总裁，取代 John Giannandrea
item.description: 苹果公司周一任命资深研究员 Amar Subramanya 为人工智能副总裁，接替 John Giannandrea。【原文：Apple on Monday named veteran researcher Amar Subramanya as its vice president of AI, replacing John Giannandrea.】

item.title: Salesforce 数据显示，全球网络星期一在线销售额达 173 亿美元
item.description: Salesforce 的数据显示，购物者在 "网络星期一 "的网上消费额达 173 亿美元，为 "黑色星期五 "周末画上了句号。【原文：Shoppers spent $17.3 billion online on Cyber Monday, Salesforce data showed, capping the Black Friday weekend.】
